text: Michelle Steffin and Jennifer Steffin were born on March 23, 1981 in West Covina, California. They are twins. When they were children, they were actresses. On the television series Little House on the Prairie they both played Rose Wilder. It happened in the early 1980s. May 1985 Jennifer steffin played little girl at the stable on Highway to Heaven. Michelle played on an episode of Aifwolfe. Two sets of twins played Rose on Little House on the Prairie. Sarah Coleman and Jennifer Coleman (Jennifer Donati) played Baby Rose in 17 episodes during Seasons 8 and 9. Michelle Steffin and Jennifer Steffin (Jennifer Uden) played Rose in three post-season movies. Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Twin people Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Michele and Jennifer Steffin
